なadj + なことに

English: I won’t take that job no matter even if they offer me high salary.
Even if I’m not well, I will write that I’m well in a letter to my family.
Even if we reveal it, who’s gonna believe us?
I’ll marry him even if my parents oppose it.
It’s best to live as a family even if you’re poor.
Even if your job is boring, you shouldn’t complain about it too much.
I want to go ahead with this plan even if it’s opposed by everyone.
Even if you give up, I’ll keep on fighting.
I’ll go even if it rains.
The test is coming so I must study hard.
She threatened to commit suicide if I wouldn’t marry her so I have no choice but to do so.
I promised that I’d go, so I have no choice but to go.
Tomorrow is the busiest day of the year so I can’t afford to take a day off.
I’ll have to drive later so I must not drink now.
You would not stake your life on the cast of the dice.
I can’t afford to let him escape. I will definitely catch him!
How am I gonna go to school in 1 minute? It’s not like I could fly there.
He knows too much. We can’t afford to let him go.
She’s my elder sister’s daughter. In other words, she’s my niece.
Meaning: in other words; that is to say

English: That’s a listening device, in other words, a bug.
Meaning: in other words; that is to say

English: Yamada doesn’t have a cellphone or computer. In other words, we can’t contact him via email.
Meaning: in other words; that is to say

English: My father’s elder brother, in other words, my uncle, is a doctor.
Meaning: in other words; that is to say

English: I’m your godfather. It means… your parents appointed me your guardian.
Meaning: in other words; that is to say

English: He’s a veterinarian. In other words, he’s an animal doctor.
Meaning: in other words; that is to say

English: He looks young for his age.
Although I didn’t study for the test, I did well.
She’s skinny but strong.
This restaurant is expensive yet the food is not delicious.
Even though you say you have no money, you go shopping a lot, don’t you?
Even though I eat sweet stuff all the time, I don’t get fat.
This pizza is cheap but delicious.
Although that student has good grades, he can’t communicate in Japanese.
Although this apartment is near the station, it’s not expensive.
Noun + のついでに
Meaning: while (you) are at it; on the occasion; taking the opportunity

English: I stopped by my friend’s house when I went on a business trip to Osaka.

English: Verb-potential + わけがない
I can’t possibly win against such a strong opponent.
You won’t ever become good at Japanese if you don’t practice speaking all the time.
There’s no way I can easily forget about the article that reporter wrote about me.
There’s no way anyone could trust someone who only tells lies like him.
There’s no way an elementary school student can understand such a complicated question.
I couldn’t possibly know what my parents would have thought had they been alive, could I?
I already told him about this so there’s no way he doesn’t know.
There’s no way I can go skiing at a busy time like this.
No matter what reasons I give, there’s no way my parents are gonna forgive me for stealing money.
No matter how strong he is, there’s no way he can survive working that much.
My son isn’t giving up on his dream.

English: The dog is trying to bite your shoe.
When I was about to get on the train, the door closed so I missed it.

They must be looking for me.

No one tried to help him.

English: It’s dangerous to cross the street without looking both ways.
I went shopping without locking the door.
Trying to stick to one’s own opinion without listening to what others have to say is just plain selfish.
“What do you see?” he couldn’t wait and asked.
I took a day off work without contacting my company.
Without knowing that he’s special, the baby falls into deep sleep.
I worked straight from 9am to 5pm without eating lunch.
Freelancers don’t need to get a job, they just enjoy their freedom and work whenever they want.
Please use the coupons before the expiration date.
Let’s go home before it rains.
We must hide the evidence before they find out.
Shall we have lunch while the baby is sleeping?
Let’s sneak out of the house before mom notices.
Study hard while you’re still young.
Eat the ramen before it turns cold.
“Leave now before I change my mind”, he said to me.
Let’s run away before the police come.
I turned 30 before I even noticed.
Let’s eat while it’s still hot.
This movie is so heart-touching that it’ll make you cry.
